description: Returns a list of entity aggregates for your Organizations that are affected by each of the specified events.

parameters.name: eventArns
parameters.description: A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101" (string) ---

parameters.name: awsAccountIds
parameters.description: A list of 12-digit Amazon Web Services account numbers that contains the affected entities. (string) ---

nested_items.name: organizationEntityAggregates
nested_items.description: The list of entity aggregates for each of the specified accounts that are affected by each of the specified events.

nested_items.name: eventArn
nested_items.description: A list of event ARNs (unique identifiers). For example: "arn:aws:health:us-east-1::event/EC2/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED/EC2_INSTANCE_RETIREMENT_SCHEDULED_ABC123-CDE456", "arn:aws:health:us-west-1::event/EBS/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME/AWS_EBS_LOST_VOLUME_CHI789_JKL101"

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of entities for the organization that match the filter criteria for the specified events.

nested_items.name: accounts
nested_items.description: A list of entity aggregates for each of the specified accounts in your organization that are affected by a specific event. If there are no awsAccountIds provided in the request, this field will be empty in the response.

nested_items.name: accountId
nested_items.description: The 12-digit Amazon Web Services account numbers that contains the affected entities.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of entities that match the filter criteria for the specified events.
